title: Game crash after champ select (Help me and get a skin)
body:
Hi all.

Yesterday night i was playing normal 5v5. after 15 minutes of playing the game start to lag really bad. then i got disconnect.
From that moment im not able to play.
Game takes to long to connect to chat, then after connecting it disconnect again.
and when i try to play, after champ select. the screen just go black and nothing happen.
when i Alt+Tab it says: "check your internet connection and try again".
So i try again and still same problem.

Please help me, i will buy mistery skin to who can resolve it.

Regards,

Dr Hofmann

replies.body:
I found the solution.

Leave computer, buy a bag of weed, make sex, wait 24 hours then game will work perfect!
thanks to everyone who try to help :)

I don't need a mystery skin, but I'm happy to help out where I can!

Most of the time, disconnections from the servers or game platform are caused by network settings that conflict with League. I strongly recommend checking out the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a next step in resolving this.

If you continue to have issues after ensuring your settings are compatible with League, we can take a look at your route to the server.
If you can't find the problem, deleting League and reinstalling always works. But use it as a last resort because it takes a while to update all the patches.
